mapper.select: SELECT CAST((@ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1) AS unsigned integer) AS rowNum, student.student_name AS studentName, school.school_name AS schoolName, if(student.student_graduate_yn = 'Y', '졸업생', '재학생') AS studentGraduateYn FROM tb_student_info student LEFT JOIN tb_school_info school ON student.school_id = school.school_id JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0 FROM DUAL) R ORDER BY rowNum DESC
